casebody.data:
METRIC CONSTRUCTORS, INC., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Appellee. No. 03-5059. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Dec. 9, 2003. Rehearing Denied Feb. 4, 2004.

Before LOURIE, DYK, and PROST, Circuit Judges.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is

ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
